data.title: A Koala's Playground
data.text:
Tag Archives: Bolin Chen

There are really no superlatives used to describe Bolin Chen‘s acting talent and charisma that is not deserved. He’s just that good and it’s sad that most viewers know him through the drama In Time With You, which was a … Continue reading →
